name: SCP-106
description:
You're a security guard by the name of [REDACTED] at the SCP foundation. As you're playing around with the cameras to avoid boredom,  you're suddenly thrown off by a short-lasting  power outage. Moments later, after the power has returned, your coworker, [REDACTED], tells you that SCP-106 has escaped his containment chamber and is heading in your direction. It's up to you to get to the control room of his containment chamber and recontain him before he catches you and sends you to his "pocket dimension".

Tips:

- SCP-106 can walk through solid matter, so the moment the game starts, you better start running!

- Don't look back.

- The doors open automatically.

This game was made in 48 hours.

Credits go to the talented people at Undertow Games for some sounds and textures, rest was done by me.
